mapper.select: select * from employee where emp_cd = #{emp_cd} and emp_pass = #{emp_pass}
mapper.insert: insert into employee(emp_cd, emp_nm, emp_pass, emp_dept, emp_position, emp_email, emp_tel) values(#{emp_cd}, #{emp_nm}, #{emp_pass}, #{emp_dept}, #{emp_position}, #{emp_email}, #{emp_tel})
mapper.update: update employee set emp_nm = #{emp_nm}, emp_position = #{emp_position} emp_email = #{emp_email}, emp_tel = #{emp_tel} where emp_cd = #{emp_cd}
